headline: Assessing Stellantis (BIT:STLAM) Valuation After New Ram Power Wagon And TRX Reveals
summary: Stellantis (BIT:STLAM) is back in focus after Ram unveiled the 2027 Ram Power Wagon with a Cummins turbo diesel and confirmed the return of the 2027 Ram 1500 SRT TRX in its “Resurrection” short film. See our latest analysis for Stellantis. Despite the excitement around Ram’s upcoming Power Wagon and TRX, Stellantis’ recent share price performance has been softer, with a 30 day share price return of 9.8% and a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 18.9%, suggesting momentum has been...
